data.title: Locations
data.meta_description: Die ESPERA-WERKE GMBH sind ein international tätiger Hersteller von Preis- und Gewichtsauszeichnungsanlagen für variable und gleichgewichtig auszuzeichnende Packungen. Der Firmensitz befindet sich in Duisburg, Nordrhein-Westfalen.
data.text:
Since more than 90 years, ESPERA is a leading manufacturer in food industry and is represented worldwide by its subsidiaries and distribution partners.

The headquarters of ESPERA, which is family-operated since three generations, is in Duisburg, Germany. Other locations are in France, Belgium, Netherland, Italy, Spain, Switzerland and Taiwan. Moreover ESPERA has a worldwide sales- and service network via it´s international partners.

Germany
